title: Seattle City Council 9/21/2020
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.9 through October 1, 2020. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and Seattle Channel online.

Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations, Approval of the Journal, Adoption of Introduction and Referral Calendar, and Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Payment of Bills; CB 119881: relating to renovating KeyArena at Seattle Center; CF 314457: Office of City Auditor's request for a one-year suspension of a citywide financial condition report; CB 119889: relating to historic preservation; Res 31933: adding impacts of climate change to requirements for new legislation; CB 119886: transfer of City property at 722 18th Avenue; CB 119887: relating to Equitable Development Initiative; Appointments and Reappointments to Seattle LGBTQ Commission, Seattle Commission for People with Disabilities, Seattle Arts Commission, Seattle Music Commission, Seattle Human Rights Commission, Seattle Women's Commission; CB 119879: relating to a emergency public safety radio communication system; CB 119883: Madison BRT - RapidRide G Line project; CB 119857: relating to City Light Department - Diablo and Newhalem communities; CB 119870: relating to the City Light Department - Boundary Hydroelectric Project; CB 119871: relating to City Light Department - net metering; CB 119885: relating to City Light Department - voluntary renewal energy program;  Res 31968: honorary designation of "Douglas Q. Barnett Street"; Res 31969: Relating to the appeal of Lou Bond.
